languages.text: {n}Внезапно Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области сердца и кривится от боли. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Камень{/d}, ярко вспыхнувший под тонкой кожей ее белой шеи, странным образом резонирует с ее силами. Не в силах произнести и слова, девушка пытается выдрать камень острыми когтями — но тщетно.{/n} "Я... что вы со мной сделали? Что вживили в шею? Мои силы словно иссякшая чаша. Тени вокруг сгустились... Что происходит? Помогите... Помогите же избавиться от этой ноши!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Внезапно Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области сердца и кривится от боли. Камень, ярко вспыхнувший под тонкой кожей ее белой шеи, странным образом резанирует с ее силами. Не в силах произнести и слова, девушка пытается выдрать камень острыми когтями — но тщетно.{/n} "Я... что вы со мной сделали? Что вростили в шею? Мои силы словно иссякшая чаша. Тени вокруг сгустились... Что происходит? Помогите... Помогите же избавиться от этой ноши!"

languages.text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области сердца и кривится от боли. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Камень{/d}, ярко вспыхнувший под тонкой кожей ее белой шеи, странным образом резонирует с ее силами. Не в силах произнести и слова, девушка пытается выдрать камень острыми когтями — но тщетно.{/n} "Я... что вы со мной сделали? Что вживили в шею? Мои силы словно иссякшая чаша. Тени вокруг сгустились... Что происходит? Помогите... Помогите же избавиться от этой ноши!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia grabs the breastplate next her heart and winces in pain. The stone flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, strangely resonating with her powers. Unable to speak, she is helplessly clawing at it with pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... what have you done to me? What have you put into my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

Unable to speak, she is helplessly clawing at it with pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... what have you done to me? What have you put into my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

{n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The stone flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

{n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The stone flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

languages.text: {n}突然之间，卡西娅按住了心口，痛苦地抽搐起来。那块{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石头{/d}在她苍白、娇嫩的颈部之下闪闪发光，与她的力量产生了古怪的共鸣。她一句话都说不出来，只能无助地用尖指甲抓着石头，但却无济于事。{/n}“我……你对我做了什么事情？你把什么东西放在了我的脖子里？我的力量仿佛变成了倒空了水的杯子。周围的阴影变得越来越暗……到底发生了什么事情？帮帮我……别让我承受这种痛苦！”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，卡西娅按住了心口，痛苦地抽搐起来。那块石头在她苍白、娇嫩的颈部之下闪闪发光，与她的力量产生了古怪的共鸣。她一句话都说不出来，只能无助地用尖指甲抓着石头，但却无济于事。{/n}“我……你对我做了什么事情？你把什么东西放在了我的脖子里？我的力量仿佛变成了倒空了水的杯子。周围的阴影变得越来越暗……到底发生了什么事情？帮帮我……别让我承受这种痛苦！”

languages.text: {n}De repente, Cassia se lleva las manos a la coraza, sobre su corazón, y se retuerce de dolor. La {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra{/d} refulge bajo la delicada piel de su cuello pálido, resonando de alguna forma con sus poderes. Incapaz de hablar, araña la piedra con desesperación, pero sus uñas afiladas no bastan para salvarla.{/n} «Mis... ¿Qué me has hecho? ¿Qué me ha puesto en el cuello? Mis poderes son como una copa vacía. Las sombras que me rodean son más oscuras... ¿Qué está pasando? Ayuda... ¡Sálvame de esta carga!».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, Cassia se lleva las manos a la coraza, sobre su corazón, y se retuerce de dolor. La piedra refulge bajo la delicada piel de su cuello pálido, resonando de alguna forma con sus poderes. Incapaz de hablar, araña la piedra con desesperación, pero sus uñas afiladas no bastan para salvarla.{/n} «Mis... ¿Qué me has hecho? ¿Qué me ha puesto en el cuello? Mis poderes son como una copa vacía. Las sombras que me rodean son más oscuras... ¿Qué está pasando? Ayuda... ¡Sálvame de esta carga!».

languages.text: {n}突然、カシアは心臓を覆う胸当てに両手を当てて苦痛に顔を歪ませる。不思議なことに、カシアの力と共鳴した{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}が、彼女の青白くきめの細かい肌の下で燃え上がる。話すこともできず、鋭い爪で弱々しく石をひっかくが、どうにもならない。{/n}「あたくしに…何をしたのですか？あたくしの首に何を入れたのです？力がすっかり無くなってしまったみたい。周りの影が暗くなって…何が起きているのです？助けて…。この苦しみから解放して！」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、カシアは心臓を覆う胸当てに両手を当てて苦痛に顔を歪ませる。不思議なことに、カシアの力と共鳴した石が、青白くもきめの細かい肌の下で燃え上がる。話すこともできず、鋭い爪で弱々しく石をひっかくが、どうしようもない。{/n}「私は…。私に何をしたのですか？私の首に何を入れたのです？力が空のコップのよう。周りの影は一段と暗さを増して…何が起きているの？助けて…。この苦しみから解放して！」

{n}突然、カシアは心臓を覆う胸当てに両手を当てて苦痛に顔を歪ませる。不思議なことに、カシアの力と共鳴した{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}が、彼女の青白くきめの細かい肌の下で燃え上がる。話すこともできず、鋭い爪で弱々しく石をひっかくが、どうにもならない。{/n}「あたくしに…何をしたのですか？あたくしの首に何を入れたのです？力がすっかり無くなってしまったみたい。周りの影が暗くなって…何が起きているのです？助けて…。この苦しみから解放して！」

languages.text: {n}Soudain, Cassia porte les mains à son plastron, au niveau de son cœur, et grimace de douleur. La {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre{/d} s'illumine sous la peau délicate de son cou pâle, résonant étrangement avec ses pouvoirs. Incapable de parler, elle essaie désespérément de l'arracher de ses ongles pointus, mais en vain.{/n} « Je... Qu'est-ce que vous m'avez fait ? Qu'avez-vous mis dans mon cou ? C'est comme si mes pouvoirs s'étaient vidés. Les ombres autour de moi s'obscurcissent... Que se passe-t-il ? Aidez-moi... Libérez-moi de ce poids ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, Cassia porte les mains à son plastron, au niveau de son cœur, et grimace de douleur. La pierre s'illumine sous la peau délicate de son cou pâle, résonant étrangement avec ses pouvoirs. Incapable de parler, elle essaie désespérément de l'arracher avec ses ongles pointus, mais en vain.{/n} « Je... Qu'est-ce que vous m'avez fait ? Qu'avez-vous mis dans mon cou ? C'est comme si mes pouvoirs s'étaient vidés. Les ombres autour de moi s'obscurcissent... Que se passe-t-il ? Aidez-moi... Libérez-moi de ce poids ! »

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich presst Cassia ihre Hände auf die Brustplatte über ihrem Herzen und windet sich vor Scherz. Der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Stein{/d} unter der zarten Haut ihres blassen Halses flackert auf und interagiert auf merkwürdige Weise mit ihren Kräften. Sie kann nicht sprechen und krallt ihre spitzen Fingernägel hilflos in den Stein, aber ohne Ergebnis.{/n} "Ich ... Was habt Ihr mit mir gemacht? Was habt Ihr in meinen Hals gesteckt? Meine Kräfte fühlen sich an wie ein geleerter Becher. Die Schatten um mich herum sind dunkler geworden ... Was geht hier vor? Helft mir ... Befreit mich von dieser Bürde"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

Der Stein unter der zarten Haut ihres blassen Halses flackert auf und interagiert auf merkwürdige Weise mit ihren Kräften. Sie kann nicht sprechen und krallt ihre spitzen Fingernägel hilflos in den Stein, aber ohne Ergebnis.{/n} "Ich ... Was habt Ihr mit mir gemacht? Was habt Ihr in meinen Hals gesteckt? Meine Kräfte fühlen sich an wie ein geleerter Becher. Die Schatten um mich herum sind dunkler geworden ... Was geht hier vor? Helft mir ... Befreit mich von dieser Bürde"

The stone flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

languages.text: {n}Cassia, aniden ellerini göğüs zırhı üzerinden kalbine bastırıyor ve acı içinde irkiliyor. Solgun boynundaki narin tenin altındaki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}taş{/d} yanıyor ve Cassia'nın güçleriyle tepkimeye girerek tuhaf biçimde çınlıyor. Konuşamaz bir hâlde, sivri tırnaklarıyla umutsuzca taşı kavramaya çalışıyor ama nafile.{/n} "Ben... N'aptın bana? Boynuma ne koydun? Güçlerim, boşalmış bir kadeh gibi. Etrafımdaki gölgeler daha da karardılar. Neler oluyor? Bana yardım et. Beni bu yükten kurtar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly Cassia presses her hands to her breastplate over her heart and winces in pain. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} flares under the delicate skin of her pallid neck, resonating strangely with her powers. Unable to speak, she helplessly claws at the stone with her pointed nails, but to no avail.{/n} "I... What have you done to me? What did you put in my neck? My powers feel like an emptied cup. The shadows around me have grown darker... What is going on? Help me... Relieve me of this burden!"

Etrafımdaki gölgeler daha da karardılar. Neler oluyor? Bana yardım et. Beni bu yükten kurtar!"
